name: Upcrate
description:
In UPCRATE you play as a crane and have to stack crates to get as high as possible! Match three crates with the same color to freeze them in place. If a crate falls off the screen or you run out of crates, it's GAME OVER.

Controls: A and D or Left and Right Arrow to move the crane, SPACE to drop crates.

Font: https://fontenddev.com/fonts/digital-disco/
